      public Board editCenterColour(long boardId, String bgColour)
      Change the Center colour of a board
      Parameters:
      boardId - The ID of the board whose title should be changed
      bgColour - Background colour which should replace the old Background colour of the board
      Returns:
      the edited board saved to the database

      the edited board saved to the database

      the edited board saved to the database
